# Dimensione 4 di Dario Marco Bellini

Official site: https://dimensione4.it
Primary language: Italian
Secondary language: English

## About
Dimensione 4 is a solo digital studio focused on websites, MVP development, frontend engineering, and performance optimization.

## Local coverage
- Bariano (BG), Italy
- Bergamo, Italy
- Provincia di Bergamo, Italy

- Home: https://dimensione4.it/
